transport.car: Kerala has a good road network connecting major cities like Kochi, Munnar, and Alleppey.
transport.train: Kerala is well connected by train through stations like Ernakulam and Trivandrum.
transport.flight: Cochin International Airport and Trivandrum International Airport serve Kerala.

transport.car: Self-drive cars and taxis are available across Goa.
transport.train: Madgaon and Vasco da Gama are main railway stations.
transport.flight: Dabolim Airport connects Goa to other major cities.

transport.car: Jaipur is well-connected by road and car rentals are available.
transport.train: Jaipur Junction connects to major cities like Delhi and Mumbai.
transport.flight: Jaipur International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

transport.car: Delhi has a wide road network and app-based cabs available.
transport.train: New Delhi and Nizamuddin stations connect across India.
transport.flight: Indira Gandhi International Airport is the main airport.
